actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to reduce the marriage penalty by providing a nonrefundable marriage credit and adjustment to the earned income credit.
short_title: Targeted Marriage Tax Penalty Relief Act of 2000

summary.text: Targeted Marriage Tax Penalty Relief Act of 2000 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow, on joint returns, a limited credit.Provides for a decreased phaseout percentage of the earned income credit (thereby increasing the benefits of such credit) for individuals with qualifying children.

titles.title: Targeted Marriage Tax Penalty Relief Act of 2000
A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to reduce the marriage penalty by providing a nonrefundable marriage credit and adjustment to the earned income credit.
